attributes.action: Front line Police Officers must be prioritised to receive a COVID19 vaccine
attributes.background: We believe front line Police officers are there to care for all of us even though they are putting themselves at risk of becoming infected while upholding the law & our safety. Therefore they should have the same opportunity for an early vaccine as nurses, doctors and other care workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564155
